extension.message:
The extension id must be a string made of 36 characters
For more information please visit: https://goo.gl/i5d6us
Please, try again

extension_name.message: Extension name must be a string with at least 5 characters

extension_desc.message: Extension description must be a string with at least 5 characters

developer_id.message:
The developer id must be a string made of at least 8 numeric characters
For more information please visit: https://goo.gl/i5d6us
Please, try again

developer_name.message: Developer name must be a string with at least 5 characters

ext_location.message: Invalid destination path, please try again
